name: Arcane Bondage
description: A target can't cast spells until the end of your next turn.

name: Burn
description: Light a target on fire.

name: Curse
description: Until the start of your next turn, a target takes double damage.

name: Fire Shield
description: Gain 10 defence until the start of your next turn. Until the start of your next turn, deal 2 damage disregarding defence to anyone that damages you.

name: Fireball
description: Deal 8 damage disregarding defence to a target.

name: Freeze
description: Freeze a target until your next turn.

name: Instantaneous Implosion
description: Deal 10 damage disregarding defence to a target. Can't miss if the target is tangible. Can't be countered.

name: Invisibility
description: 95% chance to turn yourself invisible for 1 turn.

name: Lesser Heal
description: Restore 8 health to a target

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Deal 25 damage to a target.

name: Master Bolt
description: Deal 41 damage to a target.

name: Missile Spell
description: Create 3 missiles that deal 1 damage each disregarding defence.

name: Plant Armour
description: A target gets +4 armour for 2 turns.

name: Poison
description: A target takes 2 damage disregarding defence each turn for 4 turns.

name: Pyroblast
description: Deal 18 damage disregarding defence to a target.

name: Rebuke of Fire
description: Surround a target in a ring of fire with inner radius 2 meters and outer radius 1 meter. Whenever the target moves onto the ring within the next 3 turns, it takes 7 damage disregarding defence.

name: Shapeshift
description: Transform into any animal.

name: Stubbornness
description: Gain 10 defence until the start of your next turn.

name: Summon Meteor
description: Summon a meteor at target place that deals 30 damage to anyone standing there. It arrives in 10 seconds. You must have direct access to the sky to cast this.

name: Summon Phoenix
description: Summon a phoenix that lasts 5 turns. Each turn, it deals 2 damage to each of up to 2 enemies disregarding defence.

name: Tangle
description: Grow thorns under a target standing on the ground. The target needs to spend 1 action to escape the thorns. While the target is tangled, they have 0 agility and cannot move.

name: Veil Of Smoke
description: Create a cube of smoke around you. Creatures cannot see past it. It disappears after 2 turns.
